summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ContentFlow app - YouTube CC content discovery platform. All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tested successfully including login, dashboard, video discovery, navigation, and logout flows. Fixed a critical bug in email verification function.

minor.issue: Email verification emails fail to send due to placeholder RESEND_API_KEY (re_123456789). This is expected for testing but should be configured for production.

issues: 'Dashboard' title text uses gradient that may have low contrast on some displays - consider adding text-shadow for better readability

action_items: Configure valid RESEND_API_KEY for production email verification
The bcrypt warning in logs is cosmetic and doesn't affect functionality
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Bug in server.py line 144 - params dictionary used double braces {{ }} inside f-string context, causing 'unhashable type: dict' error when sending verification emails. Changed to single braces { }.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working: JWT auth, video discovery with YouTube API, dashboard stats, clear videos, navigation. Email verification emails won't send without valid Resend API key. Google OAuth endpoint exists but requires Emergent Auth integration testing. Clip generation endpoint exists but wasn't tested due to YouTube rate limiting concerns.
